nameOfUpdate: Further Adventures in Finance and Felony
description: This update gives players the ability to become the CEO of a criminal organization and hire Associates to buy and sell cargo through the Special Cargo Network. Office and Warehouse properties can now be purchased and utilized for Buy/Sell missions and CEO Work. Many new vehicles have been added, including new supercars and luxury vehicles. Drum magazines are now available for eight weapons in Ammu-Nation. Two new Adversary Modes, Trading Places and Power Play, are also available.
